paper_title: De novo protein design by deep network hallucination
success_definition: Monodisperse species with CD spectra consistent with hallucinated structures
notes: Preprint reports 129 designs tested; 27 folded to monodisperse species with circular dichroism spectra consistent with the hallucinated structures. Overlaps with the 2021 Nature publication; avoid double-counting in aggregation. [REVIEW]

paper_title: De novo protein design by deep network hallucination
success_definition: Monodisperse species with CD spectra consistent with hallucinated structures
notes: 129 designs were experimentally tested; 27 folded to monodisperse species with circular dichroism spectra consistent with the hallucinated structures.

paper_title: Scaffolding protein functional sites using deep learning
notes: Expressed 37 hallucinated RSV-F site V scaffolds; 3 bound the neutralizing antibody hRSV90.

paper_title: De novo protein design by inversion of the AlphaFold structure prediction network
success_definition: Folded and stable in solution with high melting temperatures
notes: In vitro validation reported 7 out of 39 designs folded and stable in solution with high melting temperatures.

paper_title: De novo design of small beta barrel proteins
design_task: Small beta barrel protein design (SH3/OB/b5/b6 folds)
success_definition: Monomeric by SEC after expression and purification
notes: 71 designs selected for experimental characterization; 70 expressed, 68 soluble, and 28 monomeric by SEC.

paper_title: Protein A-like Peptide Design Based on Diffusion and ESM2 Models
design_task: Protein A-like peptide design for IgG binding
success_definition: Synthetic proteins with functions similar to parental Protein A
notes: Four selected generative sequences were synthesized; Z1 and Z2 showed functions similar to parental Protein A.

paper_title: Diversifying de novo TIM barrels by hallucination
design_task: De novo TIM-barrel extension design (HalluTIM variants)
success_definition: Monomeric by SEC-MALS with soluble expression
notes: Six designs selected for experimental characterization; all soluble and five monomeric by SEC-MALS.

paper_title: Machine learning enables de novo multiepitope design of Plasmodium falciparum circumsporozoite protein to target trimeric L9 antibody
design_task: Scaffold minor-repeat epitope to bind L9 antibody
success_definition: Designs isolated by SEC and binding to L9 by ELISA
notes: 25 designs selected in silico by pLDDT and C-alpha RMSD; 9/25 isolated by SEC and all 9 bound L9 by ELISA. ESP computed using 25 tested designs.

paper_title: From sequence to scaffold: Computational design of protein nanoparticle vaccines from AlphaFold2-predicted building blocks
notes: 88 designs selected for experimental characterization; success rate reported as 6/88 designs with accurate assembly. ESP computed using 88 tested designs.

paper_title: From sequence to scaffold: Computational design of protein nanoparticle vaccines from AlphaFold2-predicted building blocks
success_definition: Secreted and bound HA-specific mAbs after SEC
notes: ~2,200 in silico designs filtered to 13 for experimental characterization; 11/13 secreted and bound HA-specific mAbs. ESP computed using 13 tested designs.
